title: HR Lead / People Partner: Southern Europe & MENA
content:
Teads is seeking to hire a HR Lead / People Partner for the Southern Europe and MEA regions.
Based in our Paris office (hybrid work possible), you will be responsible for developing the HR agenda and overseeing all HR processes for France, Spain, Italy and MEA (excluding Engineering teams).
Key Responsibilities:

Be the single point of contact of the management teams in each country
Support employees and create a climate of trust in the workspace
Develop HR practices such as onboarding/offboarding, benefits, performance reviews, budget forecasting...
Initiate, implement and oversee the training and development agenda
Manage full life-cycle recruiting to assist in hiring across multiple teams and territories 
Partner with in-house and external counsel as needed to ensure legal compliance
Manage other special projects/assignments as needed

Experience/Background:

Proven experience as HRBP / People Partner in the digital industry
Seasoned knowledge of Talent Acquisition practices in a fast pace environment
Must be willing to work independently, take initiative, and learn quickly
Positive and energetic attitude while analyzing situations
Strong verbal and written communication skills in french and english (spanish and/or italia and/or arabic are a plus)
Detail and process-oriented
Ability to travel when safe

===== About Teads =====

Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, end-to-end technology platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media. As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies.For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers. Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach 1.9 billion unique monthly users* in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1000+ people in 30 countries.
 
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.

 
*Global reach as of October 2021
